title: DeM1:7-8
text: Demonstrate the ability to evaluate, through reflection, the benefits and consequences of various actions within the decision-making process. (Critical Thinking)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can reflect on lessons learned from actual experiences to inform future practices.
I can demonstrate open-mindedness by evaluating how external factors can impact my decision-making.
I can compare and contrast possible outcomes of my decisions.
